stages.title: Project request
stages.description: Submit your project details to me via email so I can get an idea of what you are looking for. Expect a response within 48hrs to schedule a meeting to discuss your project.

stages.title: First meeting
stages.description: Let’s know each other and see if we are a good fit to work together. This is a moment to discuss your goals, requirements and next steps in our journey collaborating together.

stages.title: Proposal
stages.description: Once I have gathered enough information about the project requirements, I will send you a proposal that will document the next steps, estimated dates and the cost upfront.

stages.title: UX/UI Design
stages.description: After studying the provided material, I will design the UI. Regular updates and communication are essential aspects of my workflow, I will keep you in the loop.

stages.title: Design agreement
stages.description: I will send to you the designed product for you to review.  If you want any updates, you have up to two free revisions, then a revision fee will be added depending on the nature of changes.

stages.title: Software development
stages.description: In this stage we will start the coding and implementation of everything that was agreed after the design or proposal phases.

stages.title: Product deployment
stages.description: We are ready to deploy and launch your project into production and make it available for your users/customers to use!

stages.title: Guidance
stages.description: After deployment and product launch, let’s meet to guide you on how to use the product and ask any questions you have.

workflow.footnote: *The design and agreement (stages 4-5) can be omitted if you already have a design for your project.

bio.paragraph1: I am a Software Engineer with a solid background in Full-Stack development in corporate environments and an avid traveler who has witnessed first-hand the intrinsic value that PMS tools such as Cloudbeds can provide to hostel management.  This experiences, plus my immediate resonance with Cloudbeds values and culture, motivated me to apply to this job.
bio.paragraph2: Throughout my career I have worked in multiple front-end applications (mostly React based) and back-end projects built using tools such as OOP Java (with frameworks like Spring), PHP, and relational databases.  As part of my previous corporate experience, I was able to bring an inherited critical enterprise app from unstable state to a stable release in an Agile environment.
